title: Interpretation of dreams to see a bag in a dream and its interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bag: There is no doubt that everything that the eye sees is stored in memory and during the dream the subconscious mind begins to display many scenes that occurred in real life, as there are many visions and dreams, some of which are ineffective and the dreamer does not show any interest in them. But there are important and meaningful visions, so the dreamer searches for their meanings and contents, and perhaps among them is seeing the bag in a dream, and we, in turn, will provide during this article the most important information about the interpretation. From the dream of seeing a bag. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a bag with Ibn Sirin. Seeing this dream in a dream indicates many meanings and secrets. The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned that the dream of a bag differs from one color to another, so here are the following details: Seeing a black bag in a dream indicates distress and weakness. Extreme. So be careful and pay attention when you see a black bag. While a married woman sees this bag, it is a bad omen that she may divorce her husband. As for tracking down the brown bag, it was given to someone else. There is no doubt that this is a symbol that between the person who had the vision and the other is a personal matter. But if it is hidden, then this It indicates that the person has an emotional connection and does not want to show it or show it. While in the case of the dreamer he sees a white bag, because it was full in the dream. Certainly, this symbolizes the presence of debts on the shoulders of the visionary. Likewise, if there is a white bag visible, it has been decorated In colours. This may indicate that others are trying to provide assistance to facilitate and ease the dreamer’s affairs. Likewise, if a married woman sees a red or yellow bag in a dream. This dream can be a sign that she will get pregnant if she is not really pregnant. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bagSee also: Interpretation of a dream about forgetting a suitcase in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a suitcase for a man. It is certain that this vision carries a number of important meanings for the one who sees it in the dream, but its interpretation varies depending on the color of the dream and its other details. If a man sees in his dream that he is carrying a suitcase, and it contains a lot of food. This indicates On the other hand, if He dreamed that a travel bag was lost or misplaced, this means that he lost a great and golden opportunity. This opportunity would have changed his situation and his life for the better, and made him a qualitative leap for the better. Also, if a person sees in his dream that he found a suitcase, this means that he is traveling abroad. City. Likewise, if a man sees a bag, this indicates that he has found a job opportunity outside his place of residence and that Rizk will get to know him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bagSee also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone giving me a bag in a dream One of the most famous interpretation scholars is seeing a bag for a single girl. It is known that the interpretation of a dream varies Depending on the conditions and circumstances of the person who sees it. If a single girl sees in her dream a bag, where there are many makeup tools and cosmetics

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 88 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number 88 in a dream for a single girl. If a girl sees the number 88 in her dream. The dream shows that this girl has a very good relationship with her friends and sisters and that she loves them very much. If a single woman sees in her dream the number 88 and she is studying for an exam and is afraid of the result of the test. This dream indicates This girl is worried about her grades that will appear soon. If an unmarried girl sees the number in her dream and then notices that the number has changed. This vision shows that this girl has many people in her life who do not wish her well and change after a while in their relationships with her. When she sees An unmarried girl sees the number 88 in her sleep and cries in her dream. This indicates that she is suffering from a problem in her life and is trying to get rid of it. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees the number 88 in her dream, and she has reached the age of marriage, the dream indicates that she will enter into marriage with someone She loves him and desires him as her life partner. See also: Interpretation of seeing the number 73 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man. Interpretation of seeing the number 88 in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that a member of her family gives her the sum of 88 and she accepts it from him. This dream indicates that her husband will meet all Her requests and he will not deprive her of any request she requests. If a married woman dreams that a stranger is trying to attack her and steal the amount of 88. This indicates hypocrites in her life who do not love her at all. Or if a married woman sees in her dream a piece of paper with the number 88 written on it and then removes it. This indicates This dream indicates that this woman will get rid of all the pain in her life and her problems with her husband. If a married woman sees the number 88 in her dream, and she sits alone, depressed. This dream indicates that this woman has suffered a lot in her life. And you do not want to mix and create new relationships. With anyone. The meaning of seeing the number 88 in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a person sees the number 88 in his dream, he shows signs of fatigue and illness. This dream indicates that this person is sick in reality and is doing everything in his power to recover, and God knows best. When a man sees in a dream The number 88 is on a piece of paper and he takes the paper with him. This indicates the desires that he hides in the heart and hopes to be fulfilled. If a man sees the number 88 in his dream and seeks to accomplish a task in his reality. This dream indicates that he will achieve everything he desires and open his work and achieve it. When a man also sees the number 88 while he was sleeping, and he was talking with his friends and he was happy. The dream indicates that this man has a good relationship with his friends and they wish him good luck and success in his life. If a man sees the number 88 in his dream and he packs a suitcase. This dream indicates that this man will travel soon and go To achieve his dreams. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the number 79 in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing the number 88 in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman sees the number 88 in her dream and is preparing clothes for her newborn. The dream shows that this woman is going through the last months of her pregnancy and is preparing to receive her child happily. When a pregnant woman sees the number 88 in her sleep and is tired of carrying it, he points out

title: Interpretation of seeing juice in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing juice Juice on the Vision website roy2a.com is a liquid extracted from fruits or vegetables that is squeezed in different ways and is served at the beginning of the meal or to guests and others. It is preferred by many because it preserves the benefits of the fruit and at the same time is easy to swallow and lightens the stomach. There are several ways to see juice in a dream. Interpretations that we will mention to you provide the most important interpretations given by great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing juice in a dream. Seeing juice in a dream about a sick person is an indication of his upcoming recovery, God willing. Seeing juice in a dream indicates food and money if the dreamer He suffers from lack of money. Seeing juice in a dream indicates the presence of a person until his wedding date is approaching. As for seeing juice in a dream? A student of knowledge is a sign of his superiority and success. Juice such as orange, berries, and grapes in a dream indicates goodness and livelihood coming to the dreamer. Seeing pineapple juice in a dream indicates the disappearance Worries and the solution of relief. Seeing yourself drinking orange juice in a dream indicates that about the death of diseases from the dreamer’s body and the beginning of new businesses. Peach juice in a dream is a sign of a halal diet and success in the business of the fortuneteller. Drinking lemon juice in a dream It indicates suffering and sadness. Interpretation of seeing juice In a dream by Ibn Sirin, I see myself buying juice in a dream, an indication that the dreamer achieves what he seeks in life. Seeing a woman preparing juice in a dream indicates that this is an indication of happiness, kindness, and a good footing for her. Seeing distributing juice in a man’s dream indicates that inside his house his wife will become pregnant soon. Interpretation Seeing juice in a dream for a single woman. Seeing drinking juice in a dream for a single woman is an indication of the comfortable life she enjoys in her family and the happiness that will come her way soon. Seeing buying juice in a dream for a single woman indicates that she will receive good news in the next few days. Seeing making juice in a dream An unmarried woman indicates that she will get married soon or has a new job coming. Orange juice in a dream for a single woman. A statement of her engagement to the person who brings her affection and satisfaction. Interpretation of seeing juice in a dream for a married woman. Drinking juice in a dream for a married woman is an indication of its benefits and benefits soon. It can also indicate A dream about a married woman drinking juice indicates the news of her imminent pregnancy. Seeing preparing juice in a married woman’s dream is an indication of the state of stability, happiness and goodness that she is experiencing in her home. Buying orange juice in a married woman’s dream is an indication of the work that you are doing that results in money and success that makes you happy. Seeing the distribution of juice in a dream The married woman, the offer of food and the arrival of the visitor in what she likes. See other interpretations: Interpretation of the point of view of the bill. Interpretation of seeing the currency. Interpretation of the names of the display. Interpretation of the vision of the kiss. Interpretation of the vision of intercourse. Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood. Interpretation of the vision of rape. Interpretation of the vision of a young girl. Interpretation of seeing juice in a dream for a pregnant woman. Vision of drinking juice in a dream.

title: Seeing a woman I know in Ibn Sirin’s dream 2021

preview.html: Seeing a woman I know in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Many of us see many scenes in a dream. There are scenes whose interpretation we are interested in knowing, and there are other scenes whose interpretation we are not interested in knowing, among dreams. We see and want to know their interpretation is seeing a woman I know in a dream by Ibn Sirin, where we want to know that it brings us good or evil, as the interpretation of seeing a woman I know in a dream depends on the dreamer, whether he is married, divorced, single, or male, for each. There is a different interpretation of it, so follow our dear visitors to our site. Different article entitled Seeing a woman I know in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a woman I know in a dream by Ibn Sirin about a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream a woman who knows her beauty, then this is a welcome vision because it indicates that she will live a happy and stable life with Her husband. If a married woman sees a woman she knows, but she is ugly, in a dream, this indicates that she has been exposed to many problems and disagreements between her and her husband. When a married woman sees in her dream a woman she knows, this vision symbolizes the fulfillment of her desires. If she wants to have children, God will bring her soon. If a married woman sees her husband in a dream with a woman she knows, this vision is good because it indicates the end of marital problems and disputes with the help of this woman. A married woman when she dreams of a beautiful woman smiling at her, this vision shows that she loves her husband And her family and she lives a quiet and stable married life. Seeing a married woman in her dream with a woman she knows who is suffering from some illness, this vision promises her a complete recovery in the near future. If a married woman sees in a dream a woman she knows and she looks tall and beautiful, this is evidence of her husband’s love for her. And also the longevity of the dreamer. Seeing a woman in a dream with a married woman and knowing that her children are excelling and succeeding in their studies in reality is a great promise of goodness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a woman I know in Ibn Sirin’s dream for a single woman: To see an unmarried girl is a woman she knows in a dream and enjoys the beauty of her appearance. And her feelings, this is an indication that the girl will achieve what she desires, and if she wants to get married, may God bless her. The wife with whom he lives happily. If a girl wants to excel in her studies, this vision portends great success in her studies and obtaining high grades. But if a single woman wants to excel at work, then seeing a woman I know Ibn Sirin in a dream indicates greater success that she will achieve in her professional life. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream a woman she knows and loves in reality, then this vision shows her connection to a love story and will help her marry her lover. But if the unmarried woman actually hates this woman, this indicates that she will be exposed to problems and conflicts that affect her psychological life and may indicate... Failure of her love life. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is hugging a woman she knows, this vision portends the imminent date of her marriage to the person she loves. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a woman she knows in reality,

title: Seeing divorced women in a dream

preview.html: Then they search for the interpretation of this vision from the great scholars of dream interpretation, and in this article we will explain in detail the vision of a divorced woman in a dream through the website gptafser.com/, so follow us. Interpretation of a vision of a divorced woman dreaming of her ex-wife in a dream about a single girl: seeing an ex-husband’s unmarried girl in a dream. This The dream indicates happy and good news for this girl very soon, God willing. Seeing her ex-husband’s family in a dream is a praiseworthy and pleasant vision for the girl about the young man who will propose to her with his family. This dream may indicate that her wedding date is approaching and that she will enjoy a happy, peaceful and stable married life in the future. The near future. Seeing an unmarried woman divorced from her sister in a dream kissing her sister in a dream. This dream indicates the return of joy, happiness, and freedom from sorrows, problems, and worries. This vision also indicates the return of stability to the life of insight without difficulties or punishments. Seeing an unmarried girl with a husband Her ex-sister gets very angry in the dream. This dream indicates the complex problems that have accumulated in the life of her sister and her ex-husband. Read also: Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream about her divorce by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a divorced woman who sees her ex-wife in a dream for a married woman. A vision of a divorced woman going to her ex-husband’s house in a married dream. It indicates The vision indicates deep regret for the problems that arose and the disagreements that led to divorce. Or seeing a married woman whom he divorced in a dream. This dream symbolizes that she intends to return to him. The vision shows that he is trying hard to fix what happened between them. A divorced woman sees in her dream that her ex-husband is embracing her. Strongly in a married woman’s dream. It is good news and indicates that she will return to her ex-husband, and God Almighty is high. The vision also shows that she may marry another man who will compensate her for everything that happened in her life, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman that she is divorced and entering her ex-husband’s house in a dream. And the dream shows She would like to return to him if the divorce occurred in reality, and God Almighty is high. A divorced woman sees her ex-husband kissing her in a dream. The dream indicates the return of joy and happiness and the elimination of sorrows, problems and worries. The vision indicates the return of stability to the dreamer’s life without difficulties or punishments. Divorced She sees that her ex-husband is very angry with her in a dream. This dream indicates getting rid of worries and problems between them in the near future, God willing. Interpretation of a divorced woman who sees her ex-husband in a dream about the man and its meaning. Ibn Sirin refers to the interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream with her husband dreaming of a man. Seeing a man is that He divorced his wife and wants to return to her again. This dream shows his great love for her and that he deeply regrets his wrong actions against her. And that he wants to return to her again if the divorce has already occurred. A man sees his ex-wife while having sex with her in a dream. This dream indicates his longing for her And his intense love for her. A divorced woman sees her ex-husband having sex with another woman and the resulting severe psychological damage. This vision symbolizes that he will have the opportunity to travel and that he will earn a lot of money through it. The man sees

title: Interpretation of a seal in a dream and a sea lion in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a seal shows interest in appearance, shows gaining money and other interpretations. We will interpret this to the unmarried girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the man, as dead seals, eating the meat of a black or white seal, killing a sea dog, the death of a sea lion or a dream of many seals chasing me or attacking me in the sea according to Ibn Sirin and others in continuation of the topic Interpretation of a sea animal, a seal, in a dream: A seal in a dream indicates your great tendency to love elegance and affectation, which causes you to waste money, and this can cause you problems, especially when you grow up. Whoever sees the ring, this is a warning to him to take care of himself and stop wasting, because God Almighty says: “The prodigals were the brothers of the devils.”Anyone who sees a seal climbing a wall means that a woman wants to control your kingdom. The seal may indicate an amount of money equal to a thousand, it may indicate reaching the top, it may indicate understanding or knowledge of the things that will be purchased. Seeing a seal in a dream may refer to the foolish men of the world, because the seal is actually called a dogfish. It may indicate that the viewer is suffering from his lungs and respiratory system. Seeing a seal means that you have projects that you cannot implement alone, whether at work or in life. Seeing it means that you will meet someone It will help you develop your project. Seeing many seals means that you will receive help from a group of people who will invest in your project and bring you profits. A white seal in a dream indicates marriage for a single woman and stability and happiness for married people. A dead seal or killing a seal indicates that you are worried about the illness of someone close to you. Seeing a seal attacking her Another animal, this dream indicates that in your environment there is a lot of envy. Seeing a seal means serious relationships, friendships and romantic adventures. Seeing a seal for religious people who are planning to change their lives is a good omen for them with good results. Seals for a pregnant woman indicate that her birth will go smoothly and easily. Seeing a seal for a man if his wife is pregnant indicates On the birth of a boy. The seal indicates the presence of difficulties and crises. The seal indicates that the visionary’s problems are strong and deep-rooted, so the visionary will not be able to get rid of them easily. Because of the visionary’s worries and bad mood, he will not be able to find solutions to his problems. Due to the presence of a strong and intelligent competitor to the visionary, it is possible that he will defeat the visionary in his professional life. It indicates foreplay The seal indicates the presence of great and happy developments for visions. It indicates the presence of a stubborn and quick-tempered person who will accompany the owner of the vision. Seeing a baby seal indicates that there are some plans and formations in the dreamer’s life, but they have not yet been organized. When the owner of the vision realizes his ideas and plans, he will achieve great profits in his life. Searching for a seal indicates That the dreamer will enter a new job and because of the dreamer’s luck he will prove himself through his work. Feeding a seal shows the stock of insight and his efforts to obtain money. Seeing a dead seal indicates a new job for visionaries. Seeing seals in a dream indicates the presence of difficulties and crises, as it indicates that the dreamer’s problems are strong and deep-rooted, and

title: Interpretation of seeing the President of the Republic in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the President of the Republic in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing the President of the Republic in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing the president, kings and presidents in a dream is one of the visions that many people repeat. Ibn Sirin explained what the president saw in the dream, describing it as one of the commendable visions that symbolize goodness, the gospel and optimism in life matters. You can follow an article on the interpretation of seeing the President of the Republic in a dream by Ibn Sirin via: Otherwise, seeing the president in a dream and talking to him in Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing the President of the Republic in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin confirms that the interpretation of Ibn Sirin's vision of the president in a dream and signs of joy appear on the face of the one who sees it. However, if the manager argues and quarrels with the dreamer in his dream, this is a strong sign that the dreamer will face many problems in the coming days and must take good care of this matter. And if he sees the president submissive to God Almighty, this means that whoever sees this dream fears God Almighty and fears that God's punishment will reach him, even though he has committed a great sin. Not in this world and the hereafter, but the content of this vision shows that God Almighty has forgiven him, but if the one who sees this vision does not commit a great sin, then the vision shows what a person will do. It reaches a high degree, God willing, and God knows best. Seeing the president divorcing his wife in a dream with Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing the president of the republic in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the president saw the divorce of his wife in a dream, he said to Ibn Sirin, and if he sees that the head of state is divorcing his wife in his dream, this indicates that this president is his position and the person who sees this will see that the head of state or any other president is the head of state. The general shoots many people and this is evidence, but this leader is one of those who call for misguidance and deviation from the path of God and disbelief in God Almighty. And if the president shows signs of sadness and distress in a dream, this is evidence that this priest violated his religion or did not follow the limits of God Almighty and committed a sin. Disagreement with the ruler in a dream according to Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin confirms that the interpretation of Ibn Sirin's vision of the president of the republic in a dream is evidence that this person has a request from this ruler and that his work will be facilitated until this need is satisfied. Fortunately. And if one sees that he is eating with one of the decrees, this means that the visionary will reach a high position or fight a war with someone he sees himself sleeping with in his dream. And this prophet is evidence that he will marry a woman instead of the ruler in his bed, and he is a relative of the ruler or from his family, and perhaps this is evidence that this person will rule one of the cities. . In his country of residence. And if one sees that the president or manager is preparing a meal in his dream, this indicates that the president will enjoy life and happiness and pleasure will visit him. Interpretation of seeing the President of the Republic in a dream for a married woman It is also said that a married woman dreams that she is sitting next to her president and that there are many presidents next to her and that she is very surprised to be with them and in her house. God willing, she will get a lot of good and food. If a married woman sees

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing piles in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html:
The hoopoe is one of the good dreams, which heralds seeing a lot of goodness and happiness, and the dream of a sick man indicates the nearness of recovery and liberation from life’s troubles and fears. In a dream, there is a beautiful bird in shape, then the vision showed that he has aspirations and dreams that are far from God’s command, and in this article the most prominent interpretations related to seeing the bird in the dream of a man and a woman have been detailed. Interpretation of a dream about Tsalabitin by Ibn Sirin. Seeing piles of water in a dream means that you will hear some happy news. In a dream, a tear indicates distress and anxiety. A collapsed one in a dream often indicates a man who has many quarrels. Whoever sees a bird drinking from water, this is evidence of his closeness to God Almighty. Anyone who dreams of being eaten by a wrasse is a sign of brilliance and money. Abundance. Whoever sees a dream about a hoopoe on his hands, this is a sign of happy news reaching me. The hoopoe in a dream symbolizes pride and money. The plover is one of the birds that denotes benevolence and symbolizes the vast providence of God.
Tsalapetino symbolizes a man who has little religion but is superior in knowledge. In some visions, the collapse indicates the elimination of misfortunes and fears. Whoever dreams that he kills the wretch, this is evidence that he hates scholars. The hoopoe in the dream of an unmarried girl. Seeing calm in the dream of the unmarried girl indicates On the closeness of the right person to her and his strong desire to communicate with her. Killing a tramp in a dream also indicates anguish, distress, and weakness. A woman’s shrunken pregnancy in a dream provides the permissible source and you are marrying a special person. The sound of chattering in a dream for a girl who has never been married is joy and pleasure. Of distress, and a bird in a dream is distant aspirations and dreams that a girl seeks to achieve and can receive from God. Seeing single people as horizons is just a good reputation and good morals. Interpretation of a dream about Tsalaptino for a married woman. A tramp in a dream is a fair husband. Anyone who dreams of a jackal flying To his home he will receive good and abundant money. If he dreams that he is carrying a broken one, this is also a sign of nourishment and kindness. Wrinkled feathers and eggs also indicate the presence of many livelihoods in a married woman’s dream. Interpretation of a wrinkled dream for a pregnant woman. A jackal in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of For a pregnant child to see her house removed, this indicates that what he wishes will come true soon. Interpretation of the hoopoe in a man’s dream: Calmness in a married man’s dream indicates happiness and stability, and the vision heralds a prominent position in the field of business. If a married man keeps a bird in his home, this indicates Strength of character, wisdom and the ability to realize the aspirations and dreams that he actually strives for. Throwing an ax in a dream is nothing but relief and a solution to difficult crises and problems. The entry of a tramp into a married man's house is very stressful and annoying, and the huge rise is the source's livelihood. In a young man's dream, the word tucked indicates the marriage of a girl of good character and religion, and tucked can refer to the means of earning a livelihood and profitable trade. The hoopoe in the dream of Imam As-Saf

title: Interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream and its meaning in detail

preview.html: Seeing potatoes in a dream Potatoes are one of the most delicious foods and many may be surprised to see potatoes in a dream, so the dreamer of potatoes always wants to know what this vision shows and what good or bad it brings to me. What do potatoes mean in a dream? This question is answered by the hidden ones and it has many interpretations. In interpreting the meaning of seeing potatoes in a dream. The dream of potatoes indicates that you will have good luck and wonderful nutrition, so this is a very good dream. It also indicates that the scientific and educational life of the opinion will improve and that he will take the highest positions in the future. As for the dreamer who sees that he is planting potatoes in a dream, Good news for the dreamer, abundant with goodness and ease so that he may achieve all his dreams in the future, God willing. While if there is a stumble in planting potatoes in a dream and the plant grows after a long time, this is evidence of satisfying desires but with great effort and effort. In addition to tasting potatoes in a dream, and its taste Beautiful, evidence of the dreamer’s ability to find a good job and open the door to his livelihood. In addition, seeing boiled potatoes in a dream is an indication of the ease of realizing your dreams and facilitating all your affairs. But if the dreamer is sick and dreams of boiled potatoes, this is a sign that the time of his recovery is approaching. And he will get rid of fatigue. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about cutting nails by Ibn Sirin and Al-Asami. Interpretation of potatoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained in his interpretations that seeing potatoes in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s ability to achieve his goals and dreams in a short period of time. If the potatoes are yellow, this is evidence of stability. Which prevails in the dreamer’s life and rids him of all the enemies and hypocrites around him. While the translator Ibn Sirin said that seeing white potatoes in a dream is evidence of immorality and debauchery, and this vision is a sign of returning to God and staying away from sins. Also, unfit potatoes can be a warning to a pregnant woman. By being regular in her prayers and not leaving out any obligatory prayers. In addition, eating potatoes in a dream is a sign of good opinion and having a conscious and thoughtful personality. But seeing rotten potatoes is a sign that the dreamer is consuming usury, legitimizing the rights of others, and earning taboo money. It has been interpreted Seeing eating fried potatoes in large quantities means that you are going through a period full of financial crises and exposure to parenthood and debt. Seeing potatoes in a dream about Nabulsi. The Nabulsi scholar narrated that seeing potatoes in large quantities in a dream is evidence that he was hearing good news that he did not expect to hear. Also, seeing potatoes in a dream and the dreamer is distributing them. On other people is evidence of the possibility of the opinion getting rid of all the problems and difficulties that one is experiencing. As for eating potatoes in a dream and enjoying its sweet taste, it is a sign of the upcoming happy occasions that one has always wished would happen. In addition, buying potatoes in a dream is evidence of Achieving goals and dreams without making any effort on the part of the dreamer. Also, buying potatoes in large quantities in a dream can be a sign of passing
